title: Lalpa beramhote chu him takin
lyrics:
Lalpa beramhote chu him takin,
Beram huangah himin an awm;
An zinga tlan sa tlangah a bo ta a,
Rangkachak huang himna ata chu;
Berampu kut him tak chhung ata tlanin,
Ramhnuai hnim zing leh hling zingahte chuan.

Lalpa, hetah tlansa tam tak i nei,
I tan a tawk lo vem ni?
"Hei hi ka ta a ni," Berampu'n a ti,
"Ka hnen ata tlan bo a nih hi;
Kawng bumboh leh sual zingah awm mah sela,
Beram zawngin thlalerah ka kal dawn.

Tlan sate chuan Tlantu kawng an hre lo,
Tui thuk tak a kanzia te;
Lalpa chuan thihna hlimkawr a kan ta a,
Kawng hrehawma beram aw hriain;
Thlalera beram bo chu a va hmu ta,
Pil leh tanpui ngai a pui ta a ni.

Ramhnuai pik taka tlanbo ta chuanin,,
I thisen chhuak a hre lo'm ni?
Tlanbo ta chu i hmuh leh hma loh chuanin,
Thisen chhuaka i tlan a hre lo;
Lalpa, i hliamte chu belhchhahin a awm,
Ramhnuai hlingin ni tinin a chhun che.

Tlang sang tak leh luikawr thim tak ata,
Leh lungpui phen atangte chuan;
Van kawngka thlenga lawmna au thang chhuak chuan,
"Lawm r'u, beram ka hmu ta," a ti;
Lalthutphah vela angel-ten an lo chhawn-
"Haleluia! Lalpan a hmu leh ta.
